FirstBabysitter.AllowValues: Sebastian, Alex, Abigail, Maru, Shane, None

SecondBabysitter.AllowValues: Sebastian, Alex, Abigail, Maru, Shane, None

Entries.Wed: Miss Penny says we're going to {{Random:learn about dinosaurs, learn about planets, learn about stars, learn about flowers, learn about animals, make macaroni pictures, do origami, do writing practice, read stories | school}} today!$h

Sinto falta da Penny dizendo que íamos {{Random:aprender sobre dinossauros, aprender sobre planetas, aprender sobre estrelas, aprender sobre flores, aprender sobre animais, fazer desenhos de macarrão, fazer origami, praticar escrever, ler histórias}} hoje!$h

Entries.{{Loe2run.ChildToNPC/FirstChildName}}: {{Random:Rain rain go away~$h, Down came the rain and washed poor Incy out~$h, Doctor Foster went to Gloucester...$h#$b#...In a shower of rain!$h, It's raining~~It's pouring~~$h}}
{{Random:Chuva chuva vá embora~$h, Entrou um pouco de água pela porta~$h, Fecha a janela...$h#$b#...Está chovendo!$h, Está chovendo~~Está alagando~~$h}}

Entries.Fri: %How's school, {{Loe2run.ChildToNPC/FirstChildName}}? #$b#{{Random:It was okay..., I don't want to go to school anymore...$s, Miss Penny gave me a gold star!$h, It was really fun!$h, I played with Jas lots! She's my bestest friend.$h, I played with Vincent lots! He's my bestest friend.$h, I learnt lots and lots and Miss Penny said I was super smart!$h}}

%Na escola, {{Loe2run.ChildToNPC/FirstChildName}}? #$b#{{Random:Estava legal..., Eu não quero mais ir para a escola...$s, A senhora Penny me dava estrelas de ouro!$h, Era realmente divertido!$h, Eu brinquei muito com Jas! Ela é minha melhor amiga.$h, eu brinquei muito com Vincent! Ele é meu melhor amigo.$h, Eu aprendi muito com a senhora Penny, ela disse que eu sou inteligente!$h}}

Entries.Sun: I want {{Random:omelet, pancakes, chocolate cake, ice cream, stir fry, fruit salad, crab cakes, shrimp cocktail, sashimi, hashbrowns, bean hot pot, spaghetti, pumpkin soup, survival burgers}} for dinner tonight!

Eu quero {{Random:omelete, panquecas, bolo de chocolate, sorvete, batata frita, salada de fruta, bolinho de carangueijo, cocktail, sashimi, brownie, feijão, espaguete, sopa de abóbora, hamburguer}} para o jantar hoje á noite!
